instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.A2159: What is A2159? A2159 is a model number for a 13 inch size MacBook Pro Retina from years 2019 with EMC 3301, that may contain one of these boards depending on the year & configuration: 820-01598..
definitions.A2289: What is A2289? A2289 is a model number for a 13 inch size MacBook Pro Retina from years 2020 with EMC 3456, that may contain one of these boards depending on the year & configuration: 820-01987..

threads.title: Compatibility.
threads.message:
Hello, I would like to know if <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A2159</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> screen is compatible with <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A2289</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>? 
Thank you.

threads.title: Compatibility.
threads.message: According to this it should be compatible. [URL]https://logi.wiki/index.php/MacBook_LCD_Screen_Compatibility#<SIGNAL>MACBOOK_PRO_USB_C</SIGNAL>[/URL]
